item.title: It's Not What I Am Underneath it's What I Do Defines Me
item.description: Have come to the conclusion that everyone sees a different movie in their head, even if they watch the same movie. It’s all in your state of your mind. Used to think that what’s in head/thoughts matters but as grown up come to conclusion that no actions matters, what you do defines you not just what you think Related quote: Never let the future disturb you

item.title: Every Lie We Tell Incurs a Debt to the Truth. Sooner or Later That Debt Is Paid
item.description: Update note on previous quote, there has been time when I have lied to close once and was in illusion that doing it for greater good. Learnt it the hard way that every lie we say incurs debt to truth, and eventually it is paid. Better it’s paid early, or you keep-on paying EMI in terms of stress and which in turn cause high blood pressure.

item.title: Never Let the Future Disturb You
item.description: Don’t let your future disturb you. You will meet if you have to, with the same weapons of reason which today arm you against present If sometimes your future haunts you, for me personally someone close to me told a prophecy about me and it haunted me way longer than it should, hence was able to connect to it. IMO these things haunt the weak more than man of actions and yes reading does empower you against such weak thoughts.

item.title: Never Hate Bad Time
item.description: Never hate bad time. It reveals your true friends. Ref: https://twitter.com/pranavmahajan/status/1420387769252126728 Also one thing is learnt long back, and probably has become my nature. You can only have few friends with time you have. If you have more than three friends, probably you don’t have any. This is what my understanding as how now. Let see how it changes along with time. Now while frequently update this site, thought came to my mind.
